text: David William Sayer (born 18 October 1997) is an English cricketer. He made his first-class debut for Leicestershire in the 2018 County Championship on 10 September 2018. He is the younger brother of another Leicestershire cricketer, Rob Sayer. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Leicestershire cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Cambridgeshire cricketers
title: David Sayer (Leicestershire cricketer)
